title: Banned for 14 days honor level reset to 0?
body:
I just got banned for 14 days because i was being toxic to someone on the enemy team and i want to know if my honor level  reset cause of this I was at honor level 4 going to 5 soon i think and when i looked at my profile in game it had a locked icon with honor level 0 and saying this under the level dishonorable. Can Riot explain this you better please to why i don't have a honor level anymore or will my honor level come back after my ban?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
When an account gets chat banned, it is reduced to honor 1, unless it was already at honor 1, in that case it gets reduced to honor level 0.
When an account gets a 14 day ban, it is reduced to honor level 0.

After receiving a reduction in honor, honor progress is locked for a while. The length of the honor lock is dependent upon your behavior.
Once honor is unlocked, you are able to progress in honor again. The rate of honor gain is dependent upon your behavior.

So what your telling me is that since i got banned for 14 days the lvl 4 honor i had is now gone but i earn it back if my behavior is good / great with not being toxic and all the other things that you can get reported for.

I don't really get why you're surprised. You were dishonorable, so why should keep you honor?

You won't get it back as in instant lvl 4. Your honor is reset, but you can still gain levels (when it unlocks that is). You will have to be honorable to get it unlocked. 

So no, you probably wont get lvl 4 this season, and you wont get it back for free. you will have to grind for it, just like you did from level 2 previously. This time you just start from lvl 0 and not lvl 2.

yes, this exactly.

this was all mentioned in the honor update btw. go read it if you actually care about your honor.
So basiclly if i get chat banned for 10 games is it harder to me to get my honor level (my honor lvl 4) back after ban?

The punishment tier is cruel 1st and 2nd are chat restricts, 10,25, that may take 1 or 2 honors away, while the 3rd 14 day ban and 4th perma ban just strip you of all honor while skipping tiers. Honor is absolutely dead in this game, lvl 5? more like not reported, it means jack anyway in this butt hurt society, also you post your logs you will be flamed down to hell by 1 perspective sided butt hurt ignorant toxic waste of human flesh community, you are not going to get any good constructive criticism nor any effort in this shitty place called player behavior there's 0 reform 0 chances unless it's absolutely autisticlly dumb case. where you have tons of evidences,videos,streams,proof you explained, because rito only cares about what you said which may be as dumb as a single triggering ?, and not the person calling you trash saying you should be reported x9 begging for it,  which follows under harassment. It's maddeningly dumb that this is what good ol league's generation become.

> The punishment tier is cruel 1st and 2nd are chat restricts, 10,25, that may take 1 or 2 honors away, while the 3rd 14 day ban and 4th perma ban just strip you of all honor while skipping tiers.

You CAN skip tiers. Not neccesarily. And of course you lose your honor. Did you expect a cookie for being toxic?

> Honor is absolutely dead in this game, lvl 5? more like not reported,

lvl 5? more like not ~~reported~~toxic.

> it means jack anyway in this butt hurt society, also you post your logs you will be flamed down to hell by 1 perspective sided butt hurt ignorant toxic waste of human flesh community,

You sound like a calm and collected reasonable human.

>  you are not going to get any good constructive criticism nor any effort in this shitty place called player behavior

You just called the entire player behaviour community a "butt hurt ignorant toxic waste of human flesh community," and you expect constructive critisism?

> there's 0 reform 0 chances unless it's absolutely autisticlly dumb case. where you have tons of evidences,videos,streams,proof you explained,

Because you were already judged as guilty by the system we trust. You have to PROVE yourself innocent, no one will just take your word for it. 

> because rito only cares about what you said which may be as dumb as a single triggering ?, and not the person calling you trash saying you should be reported x9 begging for it,

Even better, they care about both of you.

? Why are you criticizing my post instead of op? I just showed that I dislike typically people like you because I'm a grim, dark realist individual who has seen and experience the fate of those bombarded by the boards as I enlighten the op and those who carefully listen of what typically falls before such general outcomes here. What you think the op's gonna get a guardian angel, a defendant, a kind good reasonable logical hero-like person to help them out in this tough world? Nope, that's like winning the lottery, only a few get it while the rest are down in the slumps.
Even if they did get such a immaculate person, how would they fare against the dark side as 1 person by themselves can not atone the judgement of hundreds without aid.
If they truly were an immaculate person, the players on these boards would generally upvote and comment with support.

This is player behaviour forums. This is not a 'dark though world'. I'm critizing you because I disagree with you. If you put your opinion out there you have to be ready for others to critize it. Especially when it's an opinion that goes against the common one.

I don't care about people being toxic, I just like to try to help others understand the system, while putting my own thoughts about it out there.

And if you're a realist, why do you expect a guardian angel?

Oh, and I commented on OP already.
I still don't fully understand why i got banned i cause all because i said I'll gift someone a skin  just as a friend not for Being honored or anything else.

Hmm yeah, when you see your notification for logs, you'll be in for a suprise, like  getting reported by the xayah calling you trash all game when you ks her and she used your own words against you for the report logs 14 days ago, It's generally really dumb stuff because you aren't immediately notified of this nor aware till you are legit punished it's so bad that you would be having a blast in the game having fun and such, and then there's the silent tilter on your team refusing to communicate what so ever that just reports you because you took their role. even though you were the most communicative person in that game, you talked 2 much that some parts of it were counted as toxic and deemed far below the standards of the league speaking community like wat.
i think i garen that i played reported me cause i called him and his team Trash and go play bots cause they camp mid with 5 man ganks. this game something is very toxic by its self

?
> I still don't fully understand why i got banned i cause all because i said I'll gift someone a skin just as a friend not for Being honored or anything else.

So you said more than that?
> i called him and his team Trash and go play bots
sounds like he can't make up his mind about why he was banned lol{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

What a light toxic talking that  totally definitely broke the garens heart kappa, scarred for life into not wanting to go anywhere near this game ever again because of players like you as the majority nowadays are pitifully easily offended by 1 word without having a bigger understandable mindset.

You'll see them when you log in.
How do i access the chat logs

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eGcl9oTx,comment-id=000100000002,timestamp=2017-09-26T11:25:28.716+0000)

>I just got banned for 14 days because i was being toxic to someone on the enemy team 

>I still don't fully understand why i got banned

So now youre contradicting yourself?
Kinda but now i understand why i got banned for 14 days.

When someone gets banned for something you drop below 0. This is because you have no honor when toxic. So to answer your question, you will be able to go back up I believe but will take you a very long time.
Thanks for helping me.

sounds about right.
have fun getting the honor back up
thanks
Play enough games, you'll get it back (eventually).
ik but it took two weeks to get level 4 honor

Honor is only representative of how "not toxic" an account is perceived to be. Honor only provides cosmetic rewards. It doesn't give you a gameplay advantage, nor does it give you anything of real value. You're able to play the same game whether you're Honor 0 or Honor 5. I wouldn't stress over it too much.
